items.title: Donor gametes
items.description:
• Gamete donation is the donation of gametes, either eggs or sperm for use in couples who are unable to use their own.
  • Strict ICMR guidelines should be followed and consent documented.

sections.title: Use of donor sperm
sections.description: • Where the male partner has very poor or nil sperm counts, donor sperm from certified sperm banks are used in IUI or IVF cycles.

sections.title: Use of donor egg
sections.description: • Where the female partner has low number or very poor quality of eggs, donor eggs are used in IVF cycles.

sections.title: Use of donor embryos
sections.description: • Where defects are present in the gametes of both partners.
